attributes.action: "death sentance for pedofiles put them on the eletric chair"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is my opinion that pedofiles and rapists should be put on the eltric chair... i am a 15 year old boy who has a right to say what i think i belive other people agree so lets find out ...

rejection.details:
There are already a few petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=capital+punishment
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=death+penalty
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
